method.name: POST
method.doc: Returns the most strongly recommended results for the authenticated user or one of their friends, within a set of possible results restricted by topic, site, result id, or location.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: auth_token
param.doc: An authorization token, authenticating your app on behalf of the user.

param.name: topic_ids
param.doc: List of topic ids. Only results in these topics will be returned as recommendations.

param.name: sites
param.doc: List of site names. Only results from these sites will be returned as recommendations.

param.name: result_ids
param.doc: List of result ids. Only results in this list will be returned as recommendations.

param.name: lat
param.doc: Bounding circle, specified in degrees and miles. Only results in this bounding circle will be returned as recommendations. If specified, all three parameters (lat, lng, radius) must be specified.

param.name: lng
param.doc: Bounding circle, specified in degrees and miles. Only results in this bounding circle will be returned as recommendations. If specified, all three parameters (lat, lng, radius) must be specified.

param.name: radius
param.doc: Bounding circle, specified in degrees and miles. Only results in this bounding circle will be returned as recommendations. If specified, all three parameters (lat, lng, radius) must be specified.

param.name: minlat
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only results in this bounding rectangle will be returned as recommendations. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: maxlat
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only results in this bounding rectangle will be returned as recommendations. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: minlng
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only results in this bounding rectangle will be returned as recommendations. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: maxlng
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only results in this bounding rectangle will be returned as recommendations. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: query
param.doc: A string. Only results whose names or tags contain this string will be returned as recommendations.

param.name: name
param.doc: A string. Only results whose names contain this string will be returned as recommendations.

param.name: tags
param.doc: A string. Only results whose tags contain this string will be returned as recommendations.

param.name: blocked_topic_ids
param.doc: List of topic ids. Results in these topics will not be returned as recommendations.

param.name: blocked_sites
param.doc: List of site names. Results in these sites will not be returned as recommendations.

param.name: blocked_result_ids
param.doc: List of result ids. These results will not be returned as recommendations.

param.name: exclude_likes
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, results that have been liked by the user will not be returned as recommendations.

param.name: exclude_dislikes
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to true. If true, results that have been disliked by the user will not be returned as recommendations.

param.name: minimal
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, only result ids will be returned, without result data such as names and descriptions.

param.name: exclude_chains
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, results that are known chain businesses will not be returned as recommendations.

param.name: likes
param.doc: A list of result ids. The user's tastes will temporarily incorporate their positive preference for these results.

param.name: dislikes
param.doc: A list of result ids. The user's tastes will temporarily incorporate their negative preference for these results.

param.name: responses
param.doc: A list of Teach Hunch About You response ids. The user's tastes will temporarily incorporate these responses.

param.name: user_id
param.doc: A user id. This user's tastes will be used instead of the authenticated user's.

param.name: limit
param.doc: An integer, defaulting to 10. At most this many recommendations will be returned.

param.name: offset
param.doc: An integer, defaulting to 0. This many of the top recommendations will be skipped, and only recommendations lower than these will be returned.

param.name: wildcards
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, some recommendations will randomly appear higher than they normally would.

param.name: app_id
param.doc: Application credentials, proving that the call originated from your app. user_id must be for your app, in which case it can be passed instead of an auth_token. If specified, all three parameters (app_id, auth_sig, user_id) must be specified.

param.name: auth_sig
param.doc: Application credentials, proving that the call originated from your app. user_id must be for your app, in which case it can be passed instead of an auth_token. If specified, all three parameters (app_id, auth_sig, user_id) must be specified.

param.name: user_id
param.doc: Application credentials, proving that the call originated from your app. user_id must be for your app, in which case it can be passed instead of an auth_token. If specified, all three parameters (app_id, auth_sig, user_id) must be specified.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Returns a set of results restricted by topic, site, result id, or location.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: auth_token
param.doc: An authorization token, authenticating your app on behalf of the user.

param.name: topic_ids
param.doc: List of topic ids. Only results in these topics will be returned as results.

param.name: sites
param.doc: List of site names. Only results from these sites will be returned as results.

param.name: result_ids
param.doc: List of result ids. Only results in this list will be returned as results.

param.name: lat
param.doc: Bounding circle, specified in degrees and miles. Only results in this bounding circle will be returned as results. If specified, all three parameters (lat, lng, radius) must be specified.

param.name: lng
param.doc: Bounding circle, specified in degrees and miles. Only results in this bounding circle will be returned as results. If specified, all three parameters (lat, lng, radius) must be specified.

param.name: radius
param.doc: Bounding circle, specified in degrees and miles. Only results in this bounding circle will be returned as results. If specified, all three parameters (lat, lng, radius) must be specified.

param.name: minlat
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only results in this bounding rectangle will be returned as results. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: maxlat
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only results in this bounding rectangle will be returned as results. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: minlng
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only results in this bounding rectangle will be returned as results. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: maxlng
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only results in this bounding rectangle will be returned as results. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: query
param.doc: A string. Only results whose names or tags contain this string will be returned as results.

param.name: name
param.doc: A string. Only results whose names contain this string will be returned as results.

param.name: tags
param.doc: A string. Only results whose tags contain this string will be returned as results.

param.name: blocked_topic_ids
param.doc: List of topic ids. Results in these topics will not be returned as results.

param.name: blocked_sites
param.doc: List of site names. Results in these sites will not be returned as results.

param.name: blocked_result_ids
param.doc: List of result ids. These results will not be returned as results.

param.name: minimal
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, only result ids will be returned, without result data such as names and descriptions.

param.name: limit
param.doc: An integer, defaulting to 10. At most this many results will be returned.

param.name: offset
param.doc: An integer, defaulting to 0. This many of the top results will be skipped, and only results lower than these will be returned.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Returns the most similar results to a given result, within a set of results restricted by topic, site, result id, or location.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: auth_token
param.doc: An authorization token, authenticating your app on behalf of the user.

param.name: result_id
param.doc: A result id. Results will be ranked by their similarity to this result.

param.name: topic_ids
param.doc: List of topic ids. Only similar-results in these topics will be returned as similar-results.

param.name: sites
param.doc: List of site names. Only similar-results from these sites will be returned as similar-results.

param.name: result_ids
param.doc: List of result ids. Only similar-results in this list will be returned as similar-results.

param.name: lat
param.doc: Bounding circle, specified in degrees and miles. Only similar-results in this bounding circle will be returned as similar-results. If specified, all three parameters (lat, lng, radius) must be specified.

param.name: lng
param.doc: Bounding circle, specified in degrees and miles. Only similar-results in this bounding circle will be returned as similar-results. If specified, all three parameters (lat, lng, radius) must be specified.

param.name: radius
param.doc: Bounding circle, specified in degrees and miles. Only similar-results in this bounding circle will be returned as similar-results. If specified, all three parameters (lat, lng, radius) must be specified.

param.name: minlat
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only similar-results in this bounding rectangle will be returned as similar-results. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: maxlat
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only similar-results in this bounding rectangle will be returned as similar-results. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: minlng
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only similar-results in this bounding rectangle will be returned as similar-results. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: maxlng
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only similar-results in this bounding rectangle will be returned as similar-results. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: query
param.doc: A string. Only similar-results whose names or tags contain this string will be returned as similar-results.

param.name: name
param.doc: A string. Only similar-results whose names contain this string will be returned as similar-results.

param.name: tags
param.doc: A string. Only similar-results whose tags contain this string will be returned as similar-results.

param.name: blocked_topic_ids
param.doc: List of topic ids. Results in these topics will not be returned as similar-results.

param.name: blocked_sites
param.doc: List of site names. Results in these sites will not be returned as similar-results.

param.name: blocked_result_ids
param.doc: List of result ids. These similar-results will not be returned as similar-results.

param.name: limit
param.doc: An integer, defaulting to 10. At most this many similar-results will be returned.

param.name: offset
param.doc: An integer, defaulting to 0. This many of the top similar-results will be skipped, and only similar-results lower than these will be returned.

param.name: wildcards
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, some results will randomly appear higher than they normally would.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Flags a result for review, in the context of a given topic.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: auth_token
param.doc: An authorization token, authenticating your app on behalf of the user.

param.name: result_id
param.doc: Result id, identifying the result to flag.

param.name: topic_ids
param.doc: Topic id, identifying the topic in which the result should be flagged.

param.name: message
param.doc: String describing the reason for the flag.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Returns an authentication token for the authentication token key received after the user is redirected from http://hunch.com/authorize/.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: app_id
param.doc: Application credentials, proving that the call originated from your app.

param.name: auth_sig
param.doc: Application credentials, proving that the call originated from your app.

param.name: auth_token_key
param.doc: An authorization token key, received in the redirect url from http://hunch.com/authorize/.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Returns the status of the given authentication token, indicating whether the token has been accepted or rejected by the user.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: app_id
param.doc: Application credentials, proving that the call originated from your app.

param.name: auth_sig
param.doc: Application credentials, proving that the call originated from your app.

param.name: token
param.doc: An authorization token, received from get-auth-token.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Returns information about the authenticated user.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: auth_token
param.doc: An authorization token, authenticating your app on behalf of the user.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Returns the friends of the authenticated user. This includes their mutual Hunch followers, mutual Twitter followers if they are Twitter-connected, and Facebook friends if they are Facebook-connected.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: auth_token
param.doc: An authorization token, authenticating your app on behalf of the user.

param.name: sites
param.doc: List of site names. Only friends from these sites will be returned.

param.name: friend_ids
param.doc: List of user ids. Only friends in this list will be returned.

param.name: sort
param.doc: A string, identifying a key to sort friends by. Friends will be returned in order of this key, or randomly if 'random' is passed.

param.name: reverse
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. Reverses the order in which friends are returned.

param.name: limit
param.doc: An integer, defaulting to 10. At most this many friends will be returned.

param.name: offset
param.doc: An integer, defaulting to 0. This many friends will be skipped, and only friends after that will be returned.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Returns the most similar friends of the authenticated user, in terms of their affinity to a set of results restricted by topic, site, result id, or location.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: auth_token
param.doc: An authorization token, authenticating your app on behalf of the user.

param.name: topic_ids
param.doc: List of topic ids. Only results in these topics will be returned as results.

param.name: sites
param.doc: List of site names. Only results from these sites will be returned as results.

param.name: result_ids
param.doc: List of result ids. Only results in this list will be returned as results.

param.name: lat
param.doc: Bounding circle, specified in degrees and miles. Only results in this bounding circle will be returned as results. If specified, all three parameters (lat, lng, radius) must be specified.

param.name: lng
param.doc: Bounding circle, specified in degrees and miles. Only results in this bounding circle will be returned as results. If specified, all three parameters (lat, lng, radius) must be specified.

param.name: radius
param.doc: Bounding circle, specified in degrees and miles. Only results in this bounding circle will be returned as results. If specified, all three parameters (lat, lng, radius) must be specified.

param.name: minlat
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only results in this bounding rectangle will be returned as results. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: maxlat
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only results in this bounding rectangle will be returned as results. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: minlng
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only results in this bounding rectangle will be returned as results. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: maxlng
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only results in this bounding rectangle will be returned as results. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: query
param.doc: A string. Only results whose names or tags contain this string will be returned as results.

param.name: name
param.doc: A string. Only results whose names contain this string will be returned as results.

param.name: tags
param.doc: A string. Only results whose tags contain this string will be returned as results.

param.name: blocked_topic_ids
param.doc: List of topic ids. Results in these topics will not be returned as results.

param.name: blocked_sites
param.doc: List of site names. Results in these sites will not be returned as results.

param.name: blocked_result_ids
param.doc: List of result ids. These results will not be returned as results.

param.name: limit
param.doc: An integer, defaulting to 10. At most this many results will be returned.

param.name: offset
param.doc: An integer, defaulting to 0. This many of the top results will be skipped, and only results lower than these will be returned.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Returns the authenticated user's friends for whom the given item is most strongly recommended.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: auth_token
param.doc: An authorization token, authenticating your app on behalf of the user.

param.name: result_id
param.doc: A result id. Users will be ranked by their affinity for this result.

param.name: limit
param.doc: An integer, defaulting to 10. At most this many results will be returned.

param.name: offset
param.doc: An integer, defaulting to 0. This many of the top results will be skipped, and only results lower than these will be returned.

param.name: wildcards
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, some users will randomly appear higher than they normally would.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Searches within the same set of possible results as get-results, returning all topics containing those results.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: topic_ids
param.doc: List of topic ids. Only result-topics in these topics will be returned as result-topics.

param.name: sites
param.doc: List of site names. Only result-topics from these sites will be returned as result-topics.

param.name: result_ids
param.doc: List of result ids. Only result-topics in this list will be returned as result-topics.

param.name: lat
param.doc: Bounding circle, specified in degrees and miles. Only result-topics in this bounding circle will be returned as result-topics. If specified, all three parameters (lat, lng, radius) must be specified.

param.name: lng
param.doc: Bounding circle, specified in degrees and miles. Only result-topics in this bounding circle will be returned as result-topics. If specified, all three parameters (lat, lng, radius) must be specified.

param.name: radius
param.doc: Bounding circle, specified in degrees and miles. Only result-topics in this bounding circle will be returned as result-topics. If specified, all three parameters (lat, lng, radius) must be specified.

param.name: minlat
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only result-topics in this bounding rectangle will be returned as result-topics. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: maxlat
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only result-topics in this bounding rectangle will be returned as result-topics. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: minlng
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only result-topics in this bounding rectangle will be returned as result-topics. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: maxlng
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only result-topics in this bounding rectangle will be returned as result-topics. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: query
param.doc: A string. Only result-topics whose names or tags contain this string will be returned as result-topics.

param.name: name
param.doc: A string. Only result-topics whose names contain this string will be returned as result-topics.

param.name: tags
param.doc: A string. Only result-topics whose tags contain this string will be returned as result-topics.

param.name: blocked_topic_ids
param.doc: List of topic ids. Results in these topics will not be returned as result-topics.

param.name: blocked_sites
param.doc: List of site names. Results in these sites will not be returned as result-topics.

param.name: blocked_result_ids
param.doc: List of result ids. These result-topics will not be returned as result-topics.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Returns information about topics and their subtopics.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: topic_ids
param.doc: List of topic ids. Data will be returned for these topics and their subtopics.

param.name: sites
param.doc: List of site names. Only topics from these sites will be returned as topics.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Returns recent Hunch API activity, optionally restricted to a particular set of results. This activity includes preferences of the authenticated user, likes of their friends, and favorites of all API users.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: auth_token
param.doc: An authorization token, authenticating your app on behalf of the user.

param.name: user_ids
param.doc: List of user ids. Only activity of users in this list will be returned.

param.name: topic_ids
param.doc: List of topic ids. Only activity in these topics will be returned.

param.name: sites
param.doc: List of site names. Only activity for results from these sites will be returned.

param.name: result_ids
param.doc: List of result ids. Only activity in this list will be returned.

param.name: lat
param.doc: Bounding circle, specified in degrees and miles. Only activity in this bounding circle will be returned. If specified, all three parameters (lat, lng, radius) must be specified.

param.name: lng
param.doc: Bounding circle, specified in degrees and miles. Only activity in this bounding circle will be returned. If specified, all three parameters (lat, lng, radius) must be specified.

param.name: radius
param.doc: Bounding circle, specified in degrees and miles. Only activity in this bounding circle will be returned. If specified, all three parameters (lat, lng, radius) must be specified.

param.name: minlat
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only activity in this bounding rectangle will be returned. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: maxlat
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only activity in this bounding rectangle will be returned. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: minlng
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only activity in this bounding rectangle will be returned. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: maxlng
param.doc: Bounding rectangle, specified in degrees. Only activity in this bounding rectangle will be returned. If specified, all four parameters (minlat, maxlat, minlng, maxlng) must be specified.

param.name: query
param.doc: A string. Only activity whose names or tags contain this string will be returned.

param.name: name
param.doc: A string. Only activity whose names contain this string will be returned.

param.name: tags
param.doc: A string. Only activity whose tags contain this string will be returned.

param.name: blocked_topic_ids
param.doc: List of topic ids. Results in these topics will not be returned.

param.name: blocked_sites
param.doc: List of site names. Results in these sites will not be returned.

param.name: blocked_result_ids
param.doc: List of result ids. These activity will not be returned.

param.name: limit
param.doc: An integer, defaulting to 10. At most this many preferences will be returned.

param.name: offset
param.doc: An integer, defaulting to 0. This many preferences will be skipped.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Returns the preferences of the authenticated user.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: auth_token
param.doc: An authorization token, authenticating your app on behalf of the user.

param.name: result_ids
param.doc: List of result ids. Only preferences for these results will be returned.

param.name: sites
param.doc: List of site names. Only preferences for results from these sites will be returned.

param.name: types
param.doc: A list of preference types from 'like', 'dislike', 'favorite', 'checkin', 'purchase', 'return', 'click', 'share', 'rate', 'guess-like', 'guess-dislike', '*hate', '*dislike', '*okay', '*like', '*love', or 'not-interested'. Only preferences set with these types will be returned.

param.name: limit
param.doc: An integer, defaulting to 10. At most this many preferences will be returned.

param.name: offset
param.doc: An integer, defaulting to 0. This many preferences will be skipped.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Records a preference for the authenticated user, or a guess preference for a friend of the authenticated user.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: auth_token
param.doc: An authorization token, authenticating your app on behalf of the user.

param.name: result_id
param.doc: Result id, identifying the result the preference applies to.

param.name: types
param.doc: A list of preference types. Each type must be one of 'favorite', 'like', 'dislike', 'checkin', 'purchase', 'return', 'click', 'share', 'rate', '*hate', '*dislike', '*okay', '*like', '*love', or 'not-interested'. Types beginning with '*' correspond to star ratings on hunch.com. If friend_id is passed, each type must be one of 'guess-like' or 'guess-dislike'.

param.name: rating
param.doc: A number between 0 and 1, representing the user's rating of the item, where 0 denotes dislike and 1 denotes like. Use if and only if the 'rate' type is given.

param.name: friend_id
param.doc: A user id, which must refer to a friend of the authenticated user. A guess preference type must be passed, and will be recorded for this user.

param.name: app_id
param.doc: Application credentials, proving that the call originated from your app. user_id must be for your app, in which case it can be passed instead of an auth_token. If specified, all three parameters (app_id, auth_sig, user_id) must be specified.

param.name: auth_sig
param.doc: Application credentials, proving that the call originated from your app. user_id must be for your app, in which case it can be passed instead of an auth_token. If specified, all three parameters (app_id, auth_sig, user_id) must be specified.

param.name: user_id
param.doc: Application credentials, proving that the call originated from your app. user_id must be for your app, in which case it can be passed instead of an auth_token. If specified, all three parameters (app_id, auth_sig, user_id) must be specified.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Removes a preference for the authenticated user, or a guess preference for a friend of the authenticated user.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: auth_token
param.doc: An authorization token, authenticating your app on behalf of the user.

param.name: result_id
param.doc: Result id, identifying the result whose preferences should be deleted.

param.name: topic_ids
param.doc: List of topic ids. If specified, only preferences in these topics will be deleted.

param.name: types
param.doc: A list of preference types. Each type must be one of 'favorite', 'like', 'dislike', 'checkin', 'purchase', 'return', 'click', 'share', 'rate', '*hate', '*dislike', '*okay', '*like', '*love', or 'not-interested'. Types beginning with '*' correspond to star ratings on hunch.com. If friend_id is passed, each type must be one of 'guess-like' or 'guess-dislike'.

param.name: friend_id
param.doc: A user id, which must refer to a friend of the authenticated user. Guess preference types must be passed.

param.name: app_id
param.doc: Application credentials, proving that the call originated from your app. user_id must be for your app, in which case it can be passed instead of an auth_token. If specified, all three parameters (app_id, auth_sig, user_id) must be specified.

param.name: auth_sig
param.doc: Application credentials, proving that the call originated from your app. user_id must be for your app, in which case it can be passed instead of an auth_token. If specified, all three parameters (app_id, auth_sig, user_id) must be specified.

param.name: user_id
param.doc: Application credentials, proving that the call originated from your app. user_id must be for your app, in which case it can be passed instead of an auth_token. If specified, all three parameters (app_id, auth_sig, user_id) must be specified.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Returns the most strongly predicted Teach Hunch About You responses for the authenticated user, potentially restricted to a set of possible responses.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: auth_token
param.doc: An authorization token, authenticating your app on behalf of the user.

param.name: allowed_qids
param.doc: List of question ids. Only responses to these questions will be returned as predictions.

param.name: blocked_qids
param.doc: List of question ids. Responses to these questions will not be returned as predictions.

param.name: blocked_rids
param.doc: List of response ids. These responses will not be returned as predictions.

param.name: avoid_rids
param.doc: List of response ids. Responses which are highly-correlated to any of these responses will not be returned as predictions.

param.name: likes
param.doc: A list of result ids. The user's tastes will temporarily incorporate their positive preference for these results.

param.name: dislikes
param.doc: A list of result ids. The user's tastes will temporarily incorporate their negative preference for these results.

param.name: responses
param.doc: A list of Teach Hunch About You response ids. The user's tastes will temporarily incorporate these responses.

param.name: limit
param.doc: An integer, defaulting to 10. At most this many predictions will be returned.

param.name: offset
param.doc: An integer, defaulting to 0. This many of the top predictions will be skipped, and only predictions lower than these will be returned.

param.name: app_id
param.doc: Application credentials, proving that the call originated from your app. user_id must be for your app, in which case it can be passed instead of an auth_token. If specified, all three parameters (app_id, auth_sig, user_id) must be specified.

param.name: auth_sig
param.doc: Application credentials, proving that the call originated from your app. user_id must be for your app, in which case it can be passed instead of an auth_token. If specified, all three parameters (app_id, auth_sig, user_id) must be specified.

param.name: user_id
param.doc: Application credentials, proving that the call originated from your app. user_id must be for your app, in which case it can be passed instead of an auth_token. If specified, all three parameters (app_id, auth_sig, user_id) must be specified.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Returns data for given Teach Hunch About You questions, or returns the next question to be asked to the authenticated user. Also, if the authenticated user has responded to any of the returned questions, their responses will be returned.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: auth_token
param.doc: An authorization token, authenticating your app on behalf of the user.

param.name: question_id
param.doc: A question id, identifying the question to be returned.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Records the authenticated user's response to a Teach Hunch About You question.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: auth_token
param.doc: An authorization token, authenticating your app on behalf of the user.

param.name: question_id
param.doc: A question id, identifying the question to be returned.

param.name: response_id
param.doc: A response id, identifying the response the user chose. If not provided, then the user is recorded as having 'skipped' the given question.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Saves a result in the authenticated user's Hunch Feed.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: auth_token
param.doc: An authorization token, authenticating your app on behalf of the user.

param.name: result_id
param.doc: Result id, identifying the result to be saved.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Recommends a result in the authenticated user's Hunch Feed.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: auth_token
param.doc: An authorization token, authenticating your app on behalf of the user.

param.name: result_id
param.doc: Result id, identifying the result to be recommended.

param.name: recommendation
param.doc: A string, providing the text of the user's recommendation.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Removes the authenticated user's save of a result they've previously saved in the Hunch Feed.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: auth_token
param.doc: An authorization token, authenticating your app on behalf of the user.

param.name: result_id
param.doc: Result id, identifying the result whose save should be deleted.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Removes the authenticated user's recommendation from a result they've previously recommended in the Hunch Feed.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: auth_token
param.doc: An authorization token, authenticating your app on behalf of the user.

param.name: result_id
param.doc: Result id, identifying the result whose recommendation should be deleted.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Combines multiple API calls into one. This can be useful for reducing latency, especially in mobile applications. Calls are executed in the order they are given; if a call fails then no calls after it are executed.

param.name: auth_basic
param.doc: An authorization param, authenticating your app to use basic HTTP.

param.name: calls
param.doc: A JSON array, listing the desired method calls.

param.name: callback
param.doc: A JSONP callback. This will be prepended to the parenthesized response, which will be returned as text/javascript.

param.name: suppress_http_errors
param.doc: A boolean, defaulting to false. If true, even error responses will have an HTTP response code of 200.
